articles.title: Pelosi to meet Taiwan president, China drills underway
articles.description: US House Speaker arrives in Taiwan’s parliament as Beijing continues military drills and announces trade bans on island.
articles.content:

Live updatesLive updates, 
US House Speaker arrives in Taiwans parliament as Beijing continues military drills and announces trade bans on the self-ruled sland.
